nodes.text: The Wookiee Army was the armed forces of the Wookiee race. During the waning days of the Clone Wars, the Wookiee home planet of Kashyyyk was threatened by a Separatist invasion force. As a result, the Grand Army of the Galactic Republic deployed a battalion of clone troopers led by Jedi General Yoda to reinforce the Wookiee warriors in the Battle of Kashyyyk.
